  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(int connectionChoice, int portChoice, String ip, boolean gui, String nickname) throws IOException, NotBoundException
      Constructor for the Client class. Initializes a new player, sets up the connection to the server based on the specified parameters (RMI or Socket), initializes the GUI if enabled, starts the client update threads, and finalizes the connection process.
      Parameters:
      connectionChoice - Type of connection chosen by the client (1 for RMI, 2 for Socket).
      portChoice - Port number to connect to (RMI or Socket).
      ip - IP address of the server.
      gui - Boolean indicating whether the client uses a GUI.
      nickname - Nickname chosen by the client for identification.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during socket connection setup.
      NotBoundException - If the RMI registry lookup fails.

  • Method Details

    • clientUpdateThread

      public void clientUpdateThread() throws RemoteException, InterruptedException
      Thread that continuously listens for actions received from the server and updates the client's state and interface accordingly.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote exception occurs during communication with the server.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting for actions from the server.

      Throws:

    • serverUpdateThread

      public void serverUpdateThread() throws InterruptedException, RemoteException
      Check the currente queue of actions and sends em to server, first in first out
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting for actions in the clientActionsToSend queue.
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related issue with the RMI server.

    • waitingRoutineOneUser

      public void waitingRoutineOneUser()
      Countdown starting when all the players disconnect but one After 30s if noone reconnects, the last player is automatically declared as the winner and the game ends
